nodes.text: 4A-2R was a pirate droid and member of Hondo Ohnaka's pirate gang during the Clone Wars.
4A-2R had the body of a Cybot Galactica protocol droid and an oversized head containing surveillance equipment.

The droid was first seen on Vanqor in 22 BBY, when he and Hondo Ohnaka's pirate gang were scavenging a crashed solar sailer. The gang met Count Dooku and offered him a passage to the nearest planet, Florrum, six parsecs away. The droid was later on the planet Florrum at a bar in Hondo Ohnaka's pirate outpost.
Three droids of the same type are shown simultaneously in the episode "Lethal Trackdown", and it is unknown which one is 4A-2R.
